TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecureConversationSecurityTokenParameters extends System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters

summary.span: 表示安全对话安全令牌的参数。

span.span: Represents the parameters for a secure conversation security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是令牌属性和方法的集合，并可用于创建安全绑定元素和令牌。This class is a collection of token properties and methods, and is used in creating security binding elements and tokens. 安全对话涉及到多条消息的交换，并且使用安全上下文来确保安全性。Secure conversations involve the exchange of multiple messages, and use a security context to ensure security. 在通信会话的整个生存期内，通信各方将共享安全上下文。A security context is shared among the communicating parties for the lifetime of a communications session.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `bootstrapSecurityBindingElement` 指定要在对安全对话令牌颁发过程中交换的消息进行保护时使用的安全绑定元素。`bootstrapSecurityBindingElement` specifies the security binding element to use when securing the messages exchanged as part of the secure conversation token issuance.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from the properties of a specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `bootstrapSecurityBindingElement` 指定要在对安全对话令牌颁发过程中交换的消息进行保护时使用的安全绑定元素。`bootstrapSecurityBindingElement` specifies the security binding element to use when securing the messages exchanged as part of the secure conversation token issuance. 如果 `requireCancellation` 为 `true`，则颁发基于会话的安全上下文令牌；否则，颁发基于 Cookie 的安全上下文令牌。If `requireCancellation` is `true`, a session-based security context token is issued; otherwise, a cookie-based security context token is issued.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `bootstrapSecurityBindingElement` 指定要在对安全对话令牌颁发过程中交换的消息进行保护时使用的安全绑定元素。`bootstrapSecurityBindingElement` specifies the security binding element to use when securing the messages exchanged as part of the secure conversation token issuance. 如果 `requireCancellation` 为 `true`，则颁发基于会话的安全上下文令牌；否则，颁发基于 Cookie 的安全上下文令牌。If `requireCancellation` is `true`, a session-based security context token is issued; otherwise, a cookie-based security context token is issued. `bootstrapProtectionRequirements` 指示在安全对话令牌颁发过程中交换的消息的保护要求。`bootstrapProtectionRequirements` indicates the protection requirements of the messages exchanged as part of the secure conversation token issuance.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示安全令牌是否具有非对称密钥。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the security token has an asymmetric key.
This property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非对称密钥用于公钥加密，公钥加密使用两个密钥，即在数学上相关的一个公钥和一个私钥。Asymmetric keys are used in public-key cryptography, which uses two keys, a public key and a private key, which are related mathematically. 公钥可广泛分发，私钥则保密。The public key is distributed widely, but the private key is kept secret. 在公钥加密中，无需交换公共密钥。In public-key cryptography, there is no need to exchange a common key.

span.span: if cancellation is required; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 Windows 身份验证与安全上下文令牌结合使用时，WCF 不会 使用实际调用方的标识来填充属性，而是将属性设置为匿名。When Windows authentication is used in combination with a security context token, WCF does not populate the property with the actual caller's identity, but instead sets the property to anonymous. 因为 WCF 安全性必须为来自传入安全上下文令牌的每个请求重新创建服务安全上下文的内容，所以服务器不会跟踪内存中的安全会话。Because WCF security must re-create the content of the service security context for every request from the incoming security context token, the server does not keep track of the security session in the memory. 因为不可能将 实例序列化为安全上下文令牌，所以 属性返回一个匿名标识。Because it is impossible to serialize the instance into the security context token, the property returns an anonymous identity. 下面的配置演示这一行为。The following configuration exhibits this behavior. ``` ``` 有关安全上下文令牌的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：为安全会话创建安全上下文令牌](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-security-context-token-for-a-secure-session)。For more information about security context tokens, see [How to: Create a Security Context Token for a Secure Session](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-security-context-token-for-a-secure-session).
